description: GoAnywhere Perpetual Licence with Support and Maintenance
full_summary:
=================
### GoAnywhere Licence with Support Solicitation Summary

#### Solicitation Details

*   **Solicitation Number:** BPM020460/25028
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Publication Date:** 2023-12-28
*   **Closing Date:** 2024-01-23T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** None
*   **Tender Status:** **Expired**

#### Service or Good

*   **Service Description:** GoAnywhere Perpetual Licence with Support and Maintenance (or equivalent)
*   **Trade Agreements Applied:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
*   **Area of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

#### Terms and Conditions

*   **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
*   **Contracting Entity Contact Information:** Sandra Ladouceur, Phone: 613-302-0766, Fax: 613-960-6026

#### Contract Terms

*   **End User Entities:** Shared Services Canada
*   **End User Entities Contact Information:** 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada
*   **Contract Award:** The term of the contract will run for One (1) Year from the date of award, although this can be negotiated and agreed upon between the supplier and Shared Services Canada. Suppliers should be prepared to provide evidence of compliance with all relevant Canadian laws and regulations.

#### Bidding and Tendering Requirements

*   **Tender Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **P2P Portal Registration:** Suppliers must register with the SSC P2P Portal in order to submit their bid.
*   **Submission Requirements:** Suppliers must submit their bid through the P2P Portal by the closing date and time of the solicitation.

#### Notice URL and Reports Documents

*   **Notice URL:** None
*   **Reports Documents:** Available on the SSC website at this link: <https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/E0C9C75A-B294-43DA-8A62-3B0B5304541F>
*   **Attachments:** Available on the SSC website. You can download from the following links: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil
